channel.title: Village in need
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Village in need"

item.title: Re: Village in need
item.content:encoded: I would if you want. My village is the Uchiha. We allready have a alliance in place. search AoB to see it.

item.title: Village in need
item.content:encoded:
Shinogobmi village is a village created and run by Nurute.
It's a really small village with lots of resources and Ryo. However, we're really short on members. Once having 5 members (and getting all related upgrades), we are down to 2 active members (2 left for Sp.Jonin) and we REALLY need new members. Please join and help this village grow!

PS: Uzuki, If we're in the war (need members first tough) want to have an alliance?
